application.title: Application
application.text1: Our dorm comprises two differnt kinds of apartments. First, there are 39 family apartments that are exclusively available to couples or single parents with at least one child. Here, the rent totals 440-460 €. Second, we have 40 shared apartments for two persons where rent totals 352 € per tenant.
application.text2: In both cases, the apartment has a size of 61 m². The rent includes all ancilliary costs and costs for heating. Only costs for electricity must be paid in addition to that and is billed separately by the provider. Additionally, we collect a small fee for our living community from every tenant.
application.text3: The most frequently asked questions of applicants are answered in the FAQs of the Studierendenwerk. You can apply for a place in our dorm at the central application portal.
